Solutions Manual for Statistical Learning with Sparsity Chapter 1 A Solutions Manual 1.1 Compiling this Book

Solutions Manual for Statistical Learning with Sparsity Johan Larsson 2020-07-03 Chapter 1 A Solutions Manual This is an unofficial solutions manual for Hastie, Tibshirani, and Wainwright (2015). I happily accept additions to the solutions through pull requests on github. 1.1 Compiling this Book To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.org/tinytex/. References
